attributes.action: alter all official government forms (especially the upcoming census) to allow for those with no religion to tick a box saying "none" instead of "other".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Presently all government designed forms e.g.school records only allow those without any religion to tick a box marked "other", thereby implying that the individual has a religion other than those options listed.I propose that an option for "none" be added to all such forms so as to reflect the true religious picture in this country.This is particularly important for the upcoming census as you are supposed to complete them truthfully yet this is currently impossible for many.
